review_text: We have stayed at many vacation rentals, from LA to Istanbul, but this one was probably the most impressive. The place itself is lovely, a home redone with thoughtful attention to detail everywhere. The location is great. There are not a ton of restaurants on the square but you can certainly walk to a few. We loved sitting outside at the firepit and letting the kids roast marshmallows. Stephenville is not far from Glen Rose, Dinosaur World, Dinosaur Valley State Park, and Fossil Rim. So if you are looking for a great jumping-off point that is beautiful and comfortable, this is it. But we were most touched by the many little details added (details that many owners would not want to spend money on): from the plentiful amount of K-cups for the coffee maker, to the candy jars in the pantry, from the gold laminated book that told you all about the space and the town to the beach towels in the closet, from the pancake mix, oatmeal, and other necessities on hand, truly every want or need was anticipated. I loved the counter-top crushed ice machine! We will definitely stay here again whenever we are in the area. My two boys LOVED the house and referred to it as The White House, asking often if we could live there. Thank you for a wonderful stay!
